availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, examiner. Sumner County, Tennessee, native. Married Vitula Lambuth on December 21, 1852. Father of Juliet Lambuth, Allice Lambuth, and Willie Lambuth. County Examiner of the Muhlenberg County Court in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenburg County, Division No. 2, p. 41. "Kentucky, County Marriages, 1797-1954," database with images, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:FWYG-G8S : accessed 19 July 2017)
